item.description:
IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT We now collaborate with The London-Paris Business Referral Network and The Paris Business Referral Network. Be sure to join both groups. See the message board for further details. Also be sure to join our SOCIAL NETWORK at http://bfme.flux.com... At our last meetup we made a tentative date for the fashion event during the last week of September. We are planning on combining the fashion event with a panel discussion regarding licensing, promotion and marketing issues in the music industry today. We plan on continuing to make preparations for the event at the September 16 meetup. If you are a member that is interested in participating email the group organizer or use the message board to communicate how you could potentialy
help.
item.how_to_find_us: A table is reserved for us.
item.name: Boston International Fashion and Music Event Planning Group September Meetup
